Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2017 06:45PM - edited Mar 29, 2017 06:48PM by Robin1234 I had a bilateral mastectomy with reconstruction at the same time. I only had bc in my left breast and my insurance paid for it but wouldn't pay for the genetic testing but they're following appeal for that now.
